# Payer Portal Automation API

This API automates EOB retrieval and appeal submission for payer portals.

---

## How to Run

1. Make sure all required NuGet packages are installed (`Microsoft.Playwright`, `Swashbuckle.AspNetCore`, etc.).
2. Run the project in Visual Studio:
   - Set `PayerPortalAutomation.API` as the Startup project.
   - Press **F5** â†’ the browser will automatically open Swagger UI at the root: `https://localhost:7187/`.
   
  ## CSV Location
   The payer_targets.csv file is located in the API project folder:
   src/PayerPortalAutomation.API/payer_targets.csv
   
  ## Sample API Calls
 ###  EOB Retrieval
 ###   "download": true,

 {
  "payerId": "PAYER_001",
  "taxId": "12-3456789",
  "dateFrom": "2025-01-01",
  "dateTo": "2026-01-31",
  "maxEobs": 3,
  "download": true,
  "forceRedownload": false,
  "dedupe": {
    "mode": "eobId",
    "scope": "run"
  }
}
###   "download": false,
{
  "payerId": "PAYER_001",
  "taxId": "12-3456789",
  "dateFrom": "2025-01-01",
  "dateTo": "2026-01-31",
  "maxEobs": 3,
  "download": false,
  "forceRedownload": false,
  "dedupe": {
    "mode": "eobId",
    "scope": "run"
  }
}
  ### Appeal Submission
   {
  "payerId": "PAYER_001",
  "taxId": "12-3456789",
  "claimId": "CLM-998877",
  "appealType": "administrative",
  "reason": "Medical necessity documentation attached",
  "attachments": [
    {
      "fileName": "logo_blue.png",      "contentBase64":""
    }
  ],
  "submit": true
}

## Downloaded PDFs and Artifacts
All downloaded files are saved in:
src/PayerPortalAutomation.API/artifacts/
### Each run creates a subfolder with the runId as its name:
artifacts/{runId}/eobs/

## Optional Enhancements / Hardening

Retry/backoff for temporary network failures or timeouts.
Store run history (SQLite or JSON) for idempotent reruns.
Polling for appeal submission status.
Detailed logging with error files (HTML/Screenshot) on failures.
Secure handling of sensitive data (encrypted environment variables).
Swagger authentication (API Key / JWT) to restrict access.
